Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class TurnManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.TurnManager
public class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class that contains methods invoked by client message's server process methods. Controller's methods modify Model classes and return Server Messages for the client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TurnManager​(CardsDeck cardsDeck, MarketBoard marketBoard)
    This constructor will be used when a game is restored.

  • Constructor Details

    • TurnManager

      public TurnManager​(CardsDeck cardsDeck, MarketBoard marketBoard)
      This constructor will be used when a game is restored. It allows you to restore the turn class with old decks and market.
      Parameters:
      cardsDeck - the decks is the old deck of a restored game
      marketBoard - the market is the old market of a restored game

  • Method Details

    • setMultiplayer

      public void setMultiplayer​(boolean isMultiplayer)
      used to set teh turn manager in multiplayer mode. Acting this way, there will be some cases when it will increment all players faith path instead of just one.
      Parameters:
      isMultiplayer -

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(java.util.List<MultiPlayer> players)
      sets multiplayer arrayList to manipulate them during the game

    • setPlayer

      public void setPlayer​(SinglePlayer player)
      Sets the single player object to manipulate it during the game
      Parameters:
      player -

    • pickResources

      public ServerMessage pickResources​(Player player, boolean isRow, int rowOrColNum, boolean useStorageLCs)
      pick resources from the market and add them to the player
      Parameters:
      player - The player is who will receive the picked resources
      Returns:
      OkMessage if marble inserted correctly, ErrorMessage if selected row or column doesn't exists

    • insertResourcesInWarehouse

      public ServerMessage insertResourcesInWarehouse​(Player player, java.lang.Integer destStorage, java.util.List<Resource> resourcesIn, boolean discard)
      Parameters:
      player - player who performed pick resources choice
      destStorage - destination storage in warehouse
      resourcesIn - List of resources to insert
      Returns:
      OkMessage if everything worked fine, ErrorMessage instead

    • moveResourcesInWarehouse

      public ServerMessage moveResourcesInWarehouse​(Player player, java.lang.Integer sourceStorage, java.lang.Integer destStorage)
      Parameters:
      player - the playing player
      sourceStorage -
      destStorage -
      Returns:
      a MoveResourcesResult message, containing a positive outcome if everything worked fine, a negative one instead.

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public ServerMessage buyDevelopmentCard​(Player player, java.lang.Integer row, java.lang.Integer column, java.lang.Integer devCardSlot)
      Parameters:
      player - playing player
      row - row inddex of development cards deck
      column - column index of development cards deck
      devCardSlot - slot index of development cards slots
      Returns:
      OkMessage if everything worked fine, ErrorMessage instead

    • containsNeededResources

      public boolean containsNeededResources​(Player player, java.util.List<Resource> cost)
      Method that checks if specified player contains selected resource cost in deposits
      Parameters:
      player -
      cost -
      Returns:
      true if needed resources are present, false otherwise.

    • pullNeededResources

      public boolean pullNeededResources​(Player player, java.util.List<Resource> cost)
      Method that takes from deposits and leader cards, first from warehouse,from StorageLeaderCards then from coffer, specified resources
      Parameters:
      player - the player in the turn
      cost - the necessary resources needed

    • activateProduction

      public ServerMessage activateProduction​(Player player, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> slots, java.util.List<Resource> leaderResource)
      Parameters:
      player - playing player
      slots - List of integers between 0 and 2: they are the indexes of development card slots
      leaderResource - is chosen by the user as result of the activation of the production power leader card. The chosen resource will be added to the production output, together with a faith point.
      Returns:
      outcome message encoded as ServerMessage Object

    • activatePersonalProduction

      public ServerMessage activatePersonalProduction​(Player player, Resource prodIn1, Resource prodIn2, Resource prodOut, java.util.List<Resource> leaderResource, boolean asSecondProduction, boolean activate)
      Parameters:
      player - the playing player that chose to activate the basic personal board's production
      prodIn1 - the first resource needed to activate production
      prodIn2 - the second resource needed to activate production
      prodOut - production result
      leaderResource - resource selected if a production power leader card is activated
      asSecondProduction - if the personal production is going to be performed after a normal one
      activate - if the personal production is performed as second production after the normal one, the player has the possibility to choose if activate or not the personal production.
      Returns:

    • activateLeaderCardProduction

      public boolean activateLeaderCardProduction​(Player player, java.util.List<Resource> leaderResource)
      Parameters:
      player - the playing player
      leaderResource - is != null if a leader card is activated and the user selected the resource to activate production
      Returns:
      The following method returns true if at least 1 production power leader card is activated and inside warehouse * or coffer there are sufficient resources to activate leader card production. In this case, the production is * activated, inserting the selected leaderResource inside warehouse, incrementing user's faith path and updating * other users' faith paths. Else, it returns false.

    • activateLeaderCard

      public ServerMessage activateLeaderCard​(Player player, java.lang.Integer indexNumber)
      activates leader card of specified index
      Parameters:
      player - playing player
      indexNumber - leader card's index number in player's arraylist leaderCards
      Returns:
      ErrorMessage if it is not possible to activate selected leader card, OkMessage instead.

    • discardLeaderCard

      public ServerMessage discardLeaderCard​(Player player, java.lang.Integer indexNum)
      Discards selected leader card from leadecards arraylist. OkMessage is returned ad everything worked fine, it also increments user's faith path position.
      Parameters:
      player -
      indexNum -
      Returns:
      a OkMessage notifying the successful discard action

    • selectLeaderCard

      public ServerMessage selectLeaderCard​(Player player, java.lang.Integer index1, java.lang.Integer index2)
      method called to select 2 leader cards out of the 4 given while setting up the game
      Parameters:
      player - playing player
      index1 - first leader card index in arraylist
      index2 - second leader card index in arraylist
      Returns:
      ErrorMessage if specified indexes are out of bounds, OkMessage instead.

    • getFaithPathPositions

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getFaithPathPositions()
      Returns:
      an hashMap containing the players position in faith path. Needed to send an update version of the model to clients.

    • isSevenDevCardsBought

      public boolean isSevenDevCardsBought()
      Method called to check wether a player bought seven development cards or not
      Returns:

    • discardDevelopmentCards

      public boolean discardDevelopmentCards​(CardColor color)
      The method discards a development card of the specified color from the deck
      Parameters:
      color -
      Returns:
      false if the game is not ended, true otherwise. The game ends when all cards of a colour have been removed.

    • reachedFaithPathEnd

      public boolean reachedFaithPathEnd()
      return true if a player reached the end of the faith path
      Returns:

    • getFirstPlayerToEnd

      public Player getFirstPlayerToEnd()
      Returns:
      the first player that ends the faith path. If during a turn more than one player reach the end, the first one to reach it will be returned.

    • resetDone

      public void resetDone()
      Method invoked to reset done variable, used with locks.

    • turnDone

      public void turnDone()
      this method enables to unlock the multiplayer handler while is waiting for a user to finish his turn.

    • lock

      public void lock()
      called by MultiplayerGameHandler to wait one or all users to perform a certain action. Unlocked by turnDone (when the game is waiting for a player only) or clientDone (when the game is waiting for all players)

    • clientDone

      public void clientDone()
      Used by players to notify to the game they finished their action. If all players terminated their action, the MultiplayerGameHandler will be unlocked.

    • getAccesses

      public java.lang.Integer getAccesses()

    • setDisconnected

      public void setDisconnected()

    • getDisconnected

      public boolean getDisconnected()
